verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I will praise Him, I will praise Him, newline Praise the Lamb for sinners slain. newline Give Him glory all ye people, newline For His blood can wash away each stain.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When I saw the cleansing fountain newline Open wide for all my sin, newline I obeyed the Spirit's wooing newline When He said "Wilt thou be clean?"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho' the way seemed straight and narrow, newline All I claimed was swept away; newline My ambitions, plans and wishes newline At my feet in ashes lay.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Then God's fire upon the altar newline Of my heart was set aflame. newline I shall never cease to praise Him. newline Glory, glory to His name!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blessed be the name of Jesus! newline I'm so glad He took me in. newline He's forgiven my transgressions; newline He has cleansed my heart from sin.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Glory, glory to the Father! newline Glory, glory to the Son! newline Glory, glory to the Spirit! newline Glory to the Three in One!
